ordr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Ingredient ratios for several basic recipes

ratios.Rd

Ratios of ingredients for several basic recipes presented in a popular cooking book.

data(ratios)

Format

A tibble.

Source

Ruhlman (2009).

References

Ruhlman M (2009) Ratio: The Simple Codes Behind the Craft of Everyday Cooking. Scribner, ISBN-13: 978-1416571728.

Examples

# Log-ratio analysis of shared ingredients in Ruhlman's recipe ratios
data(ratios)
ratios %>%
  dplyr::select(chapter, recipe, flour, egg, butter) %>%
  dplyr::filter(flour > 0 & egg > 0 & butter > 0) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(flour, egg, butter) %>%
  dplyr::summarize(chapter = unique(chapter),
                   recipes = stringr::str_c(recipe, collapse = " or ")) %>%
  dplyr::ungroup() %>%
  print() -> sub_ratios
#> `summarise()` regrouping output by 'flour', 'egg' (override with `.groups` argument)
#> # A tibble: 4 x 5
#>   flour   egg butter chapter recipes              
#>   <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <chr>   <chr>                
#> 1     1     1    1   batters pound or sponge      
#> 2     1     2    1   doughs  choux                
#> 3     2     1    0.5 batters pancake              
#> 4     2     1    1   batters quick bread or muffin
sub_ratios %>%
  dplyr::select(-chapter, -recipes) %>%
  lra(compositional = TRUE) %>%
  as_tbl_ord() %>%
  augment() %>%
  bind_cols_u(dplyr::select(sub_ratios, chapter, recipes)) %>%
  print() -> lra_ratios
#> # A tbl_ord of class 'lra': (4 x 3) x (3 x 3)'
#> # 3 coordinates: LRSV1, LRSV2, LRSV3
#> # 
#> # U: [ 4 x 3 | 2 ]
#>    LRSV1  LRSV2   LRSV3 |   chapter recipes              
#>                         |   <chr>   <chr>                
#> 1 -0.324  0.495 -0.793  | 1 batters pound or sponge      
#> 2 -0.625 -0.510 -0.168  | 2 doughs  choux                
#> 3  0.640 -0.490 -0.584  | 3 batters pancake              
#> 4  0.308  0.505  0.0407 | 4 batters quick bread or muffin
#> # 
#> # V: [ 3 x 3 | 1 ]
#>    LRSV1   LRSV2 LRSV3 |   .name 
#>                        |   <chr> 
#> 1  0.707  0.0891 0.701 | 1 flour 
#> 2 -0.494 -0.647  0.580 | 2 egg   
#> 3 -0.506  0.757  0.414 | 3 butter
lra_ratios %>%
  confer_inertia("rows") %>%
  ggbiplot(sec.axes = "v", scale.factor = .05) +
  geom_u_text(aes(label = recipes, color = chapter)) +
  geom_v_vector() +
  geom_v_text(aes(label = .name), hjust = "outward", vjust = "outward") +
  expand_limits(x = c(-.2, .2)) +
  ggtitle("Log-ratio biplot of flour-butter-egg ratios in baking recipes")
# Correspondence analysis of Ruhlman's recipe ratios
data(ratios)
ratios %>%
  dplyr::select(-chapter) %>%
  tibble::column_to_rownames("recipe") %>%
  dplyr::select(-chocolate) %>%
  ca::ca() %>%
  as_tbl_ord() %>%
  augment() %>%
  mutate_u(recipe = .name, chapter = ratios$chapter) %>%
  mutate_v(ingredient = .name) %>%
  print() -> ratios_ca
#> # A tbl_ord of class 'ca': (31 x 16) x (17 x 16)'
#> # 16 coordinates: Dim1, Dim2, ..., Dim16
#> # 
#> # U: [ 31 x 16 | 6 ]
#>      Dim1   Dim2  Dim3 ... |   .name  .mass .dist .inertia recipe
#>                            |   <chr>  <dbl> <dbl>    <dbl> <chr> 
#> 1 -0.247   0.175 0.796     | 1 bread 0.0265  1.75   0.0811 bread 
#> 2 -0.106  -0.633 1.45  ... | 2 pasta 0.0166  2.37   0.0928 pasta 
#> 3 -0.257  -0.390 0.236     | 3 pie   0.0199  1.48   0.0437 pie   
#> 4 -0.0506 -0.711 1.05      | 4 bisc… 0.0199  1.84   0.0672 biscu…
#> 5 -0.227  -0.765 0.377     | 5 cook… 0.0199  1.81   0.0650 cookie
#> # … with 26 more rows, and 1 more
#> # U: [ 31 x 16 | 6 ]#   variable: chapter <chr>
#> # 
#> # V: [ 17 x 16 | 5 ]
#>      Dim1   Dim2    Dim3 ... |   .name  .mass .dist .inertia
#>                              |   <chr>  <dbl> <dbl>    <dbl>
#> 1 -0.130  -0.555  1.17       | 1 flour 0.114   1.74    0.345
#> 2 -0.430   1.36  -0.0386 ... | 2 water 0.219   1.41    0.437
#> 3 -0.0643 -0.646  1.50       | 3 egg   0.0464  2.21    0.227
#> 4 -0.346  -0.941 -1.10       | 4 fat   0.126   1.62    0.330
#> 5  0.219  -0.690  1.64       | 5 liqu… 0.0563  2.40    0.323
#> # … with 12 more rows, and 1 more
#> # V: [ 17 x 16 | 5 ]#   variable: ingredient <chr>
ratios_ca %>%
  confer_inertia("rowprincipal") %>%
  ggbiplot() +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_v_vector(alpha = .5) +
  stat_v_chull(geom = "text_radiate", aes(label = ingredient), alpha = .5) +
  geom_u_text(aes(label = recipe, color = chapter), size = 4) +
  ggtitle("Row-principal CA biplot of Ruhlman recipe ratios")
